about_the_game:
The Official Soundtrack for the Squad-Based Tactical RPG, Pixel Privateers! Loaded with ten amazing tracks that will set the mood for your epic space adventures - or maybe just your day in general!

Original Music by Kole Audio Solutions

TRACK LIST


1. Pixel Privateers
2. The Black Hole
3. Rise Above the Abyss
4. The Unexplored
5. Be Bold & Prosper
6. Cosmic Maelstrom
7. Slumber Among the Stars
8. Surfing the Supernova
9. Privateer Pledge
10. The Ballad of Leo & Tristan
